bio:
David Pardo Cossío is a Language Lecturer in Spanish and French at NYU Shanghai. He holds MA degrees from the Universitie of Valladolid (Spain), 2003; Universite Poitiers (France), 2005 and the Universidad de Castilla-La Mancha (Spain), 2015. David is a certified examiner of Spanish DELE.
Professor Cossio’s research interests are in phonetics, pronunciation correction and teaching, listening development and teaching, willingness to speak, modern Hispanic literature, modern Francophone literature, and modern Spanish literature.

Prior to joining NYU Shanghai, he taught in secondary schools in different countries and at universities in Toulouse, Quebec, Hong Kong and Ningbo. As a member of the Language Center at The University of Nottingham Ningbo, David was awarded the Lord Dearing Teaching Award.
